structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.catch_line: Association meeting or activity not considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.text: No association meeting or activity undertaken to carry out the provisions of KRS 234.270 to 234.302 and intended to benefit all persons involved in the production, transportation, and sale of propane and the manufacture and distribution of propane utilization equipment shall be deemed or considered illegal or in restraint of trade.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
